00030 #pragma once
00031 
00032 #include <l4/sys/types.h>
00033 
00038 typedef struct l4_kernel_info_t
00039 {
00040   /* offset 0x00 */
00041   l4_uint32_t            magic;               
00044   l4_uint32_t            version;             
00045   l4_uint8_t             offset_version_strings; 
00046   l4_uint8_t             fill0[3];            
00047   l4_uint8_t             kip_sys_calls;       
00048   l4_uint8_t             fill1[3];            
00049 
00050   /* the following stuff is undocumented; we assume that the kernel
00051      info page is located at offset 0x1000 into the L4 kernel boot
00052      image so that these declarations are consistent with section 2.9
00053      of the L4 Reference Manual */
00054 
00055   /* offset 0x10 */
00056   /* Kernel debugger */
00057   l4_umword_t            init_default_kdebug; 
00058   l4_umword_t            default_kdebug_exception; 
00059   l4_umword_t            scheduler_granularity; 
00060   l4_umword_t            default_kdebug_end;  
00061 
00062   /* offset 0x20 */
00063   /* Sigma0 */
00064   l4_umword_t            sigma0_esp;          
00065   l4_umword_t            sigma0_eip;          
00066   l4_umword_t            _res01[2];           
00067 
00068   /* offset 0x30 */
00069   /* Sigma1 */
00070   l4_umword_t            sigma1_esp;          
00071   l4_umword_t            sigma1_eip;          
00072   l4_umword_t            _res02[2];           
00073 
00074   /* offset 0x40 */
00075   /* Root task */
00076   l4_umword_t            root_esp;            
00077   l4_umword_t            root_eip;            
00078   l4_umword_t            _res03[2];           
00079 
00080   /* offset 0x50 */
00081   /* L4 configuration */
00082   l4_umword_t            l4_config;           
00091   l4_umword_t            mem_info;            
00092   l4_umword_t            kdebug_config;       
00113   l4_umword_t            kdebug_permission;   
00139   /* offset 0x60 */
00140   l4_umword_t            total_ram;           
00141   l4_umword_t            processor_info;      
00142   l4_umword_t            _res04[14];          
00143 
00144   /* offset 0xA0 */
00145   volatile l4_cpu_time_t clock;               
00146   l4_umword_t            _res05[2];           
00147 
00148   /* offset 0xB0 */
00149   l4_umword_t            frequency_cpu;       
00150   l4_umword_t            frequency_bus;       
00151 
00152   /* offset 0xB8 */
00153   l4_umword_t            _res06[10];          
00154 
00155   /* offset 0xE0 */
00156   l4_umword_t    user_ptr;            
00157   l4_umword_t    vhw_offset;          
00158   l4_umword_t            _res07[2];
00159 
00160   /* offset 0xF0 */
00161   struct l4_kip_platform_info    platform_info;
00162 } l4_kernel_info_t;
